May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix **Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 76 **Prerequisites** [Monstrosity Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=349) --- Witnessing the might of the kaiju King Mogaru, Alru, and Toraloa up close awoke a new ferocity within you. When you transform using Monstrosity Shape, you can take on a kaiju form. When you take this feat, choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage; this is the damage your breath weapon deals. You can't change this later. The battle form is Gargantuan size with the following specific abilities; the damage values already include the extra die from being a 9th-level spell.
  • **Kaiju** Speed 40 feet; physical resistance 5; **Melee** jaws ([reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d12+20 piercing; **Melee** claws ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d8+20 slashing;
    **Breath Weapon** ([evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) Each creature in a 60-foot cone takes 15d6 damage (of your chosen damage type), with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save against your spell DC. Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for 1d4 rounds.
Capstone Feats **Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 75 Player characters can select one of the following new class feats for their 20th-level class feat upon entering the _Glass Lighthouse_ or by meditating on the cushion in area H4. **Related Feats**: [All the Time in the World](/Feats.aspx?ID=2744), [Dance of Intercession](/Feats.aspx?ID=2745), [Demon's Hair](/Feats.aspx?ID=2746), [Everdistant Defense](/Feats.aspx?ID=2747), [Extradimensional Stash](/Feats.aspx?ID=2748), [Head of the Night Parade](/Feats.aspx?ID=2749), [Plum Deluge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2751), [Ruby Resurrection](/Feats.aspx?ID=2752), [Scapegoat Parallel Self](/Feats.aspx?ID=2753), [Sever Space](/Feats.aspx?ID=2754), [Time Dilation Cascade](/Feats.aspx?ID=2755), [Vitality-Manipulating Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2756), [Vivacious Afterimage](/Feats.aspx?ID=2757), [Whirlwind Toss](/Feats.aspx?ID=2758), [Worldsphere Gravity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2759)
name: Heart of the Kaiju
